Package pl.edu.pwr.student.Gates.BasicGates.MultipleInput

Class BasicGate

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.pwr.student.IO.Input.SignalSender
pl.edu.pwr.student.Gates.BasicGates.MultipleInput.BasicGate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Compoundable, CreatableInstance, SignalReceiver, UiAvailable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AND, NAND, NOR, OR, XNOR, XOR
public abstract class BasicGate extends SignalSender implements SignalReceiver, Compoundable, Runnable, UiAvailable
Represents a basic logic gate with multiple inputs and a single output.

    • fullDisconnect

      public void fullDisconnect()
      Fully disconnects this gate by disconnecting all input and output signals. Necessary to completely remove a gate from simulation and allow it to be collected by the garbage collector.
      Specified by:
      fullDisconnect in interface Compoundable
      Specified by:
      fullDisconnect in interface SignalReceiver
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the gate logic to update the state and sends an update signal if the state has changed. NOT TO BE CALLED MANUALLY - Handled by the Thread class.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
